DCC Integration Examples
---------------------

py-dem-bones can be integrated with various Digital Content Creation (DCC) software:

- Maya Integration: :doc:`View Example <../examples/maya_example.py>`
- Blender Integration: :doc:`View Example <../examples/blender_example.py>`
- Houdini Integration: :doc:`View Example <../examples/houdini_example.py>`
- 3ds Max Integration: :doc:`View Example <../examples/max_example.py>`
- Unreal Engine Integration: :doc:`View Example <../examples/unreal_example.py>`
